document_data.name: Sims Winters
document_data.mainbody: '''Sims Winters''' was the son of [[Beartrid Winters]] and [[Kalas Winters]], who worked at the [[Wolf's Pelt Inn]] in the [[Icewind Dale]] community of [[Targos]] ''circa'' [[1369 DR]].
document_data.Description: Sims was a fiery 13-year-old boy with short-cut black hair and his family's big brown eyes. He was {{SI|5'8|'"|long=yes}} tall and weighed {{SI|127|lb|k|long=yes}}.
document_data.Personality: Sims looked out for his family, especially his mother and sister. He jumped to their defense at a hint of insult or confrontation, trying to prove his manliness to his father.
document_data.Possessions: Sims always carried a [[dagger]] gifted to him by his father Kalas for his 13th birthday.
document_data.History: Around [[Tarsakh]] in [[1369 DR]], Sims lived with his family in the [[Ten Towns]].
